text: @SenateGOP @realDonaldTrump Dear Republican Voters. I am very sorry that your lives were put in danger due to misinformation by Trump when he was informed about the Coronavirus on 1/3/2020. I hope you don’t get sick, lose all your life savings and suffer needlessly! Wishing you safety and some comfort!
